cosmos.question: I'm big and bright and in the sky! I come out during the day. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I help the flowers grow.
🔥 I am very hot!
💛 I am yellow.

cosmos.question: I am white and round, and you see me at night. Sometimes I'm full, sometimes I'm not. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 I am not made of cheese, but people say I look like it!
🐺 Werewolves howl at me.
🌙 I shine in the dark.

cosmos.question: I'm little and twinkly, far away in the night! There are lots and lots of me! What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I sparkle!
🌃 I am best seen when it is dark
🌠 If you wish upon me I might make it true

cosmos.question: I'm a big ball of rock and dirt where we live. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 You are on me now!
🌱 Plants grow on me.
🌎 I have land and water.

cosmos.question: It is something big made up of many stars. Our sun is part of it. What is it?

hints.text: 🥛 It looks a bit like spilled milk in the sky.
🌌 It is a big collection of stars.
💫 It has a special name.

cosmos.question: I'm a hot, red planet. People sometimes say that aliens live here. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 Think of a candy bar color.
🚀 We send rovers to explore me.
🔴 I am the 'Red Planet'.

cosmos.question: I'm a big ball of gas that is very, very big, much bigger than Earth. I have a big red spot! What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have a giant storm.
👑 I am the king of planets.
🟠 I am mostly orange with a big red spot.

cosmos.question: I'm a cold, big planet. I have beautiful rings around me! What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rocks.
🪐 My rings make me very special.
💨 I am a gas giant.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture. Some people use me to tell stories. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of me are bears.
⭐ You can find me in the night sky.
✨ Sailors used to use me to find their way.

cosmos.question: I am a big group of planets that all go around a star. Earth is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ The star in my middle gives us heat.
🚀 We are trying to explore all of me
🪐 It is a place of wonder.

transport.question: I go 'beep beep!' and have wheels. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I can take you to the park
🚦 I drive on the road
📢 I make a loud noise to warn people

transport.question: I float on the water and take people across. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am big and made of metal
⚓ You ride me on a lake or ocean
👨‍✈️ A captain drives me

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚳 You can ride me on a path
👧 Boys and girls use me to have fun
🚴 You wear a helmet when you ride me

transport.question: I am big and yellow and take children to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I have many seats
🛑 I stop to pick up kids in the morning
👧👦 I help you get to school safely

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I am very big and loud
☁️ I fly above the clouds
🌎 You can travel to different countries in me

transport.question: I go 'choo choo!' and ride on tracks. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I am long and carry lots of people or things
🏭 I can transport goods to factories
📣 I have a loud whistle

transport.question: I carry things, I am big, and have many wheels. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I deliver packages
🚚 I can be used to move furniture
🚧 Construction workers use me

transport.question: I fly high in the sky with spinning blades. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one spot
🚑 I can be used to rescue people
🚨 I can fly in places that are hard to reach

transport.question: I zoom through space and explore new planets. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very fast and powerful
👩‍🚀 Astronauts travel in me
🌌 I leave Earth to travel to the stars

transport.question: I travel underwater and explore the deep sea. What am I?

hints.text: Submarines have windows to see the sea
🐠 I can travel to the bottom of the ocean
⚓ People use me to study sea creatures
